We've partnered with Good On You — an independent agency that rates how brands perform in relation to their impact on the planet, people and animals, with a multi-criteria rating simplified to a five points scale. In order to be awarded our conscious label, larger brands need to score a minimum of four out of five ('Good'), while smaller brands must score at least three out of five ('It's a start'). products.brandedName: Smilla Brav Turquoise Hoop Earrings Lena
products.unbrandedName: Smilla Brav Turquoise Hoop Earrings Lena
products.description: Funky, colourful and never ever too boring. Our bijoux collection is perfect for letting the sunshine in your life. Our Lena hoops are made of gold-plated stainless stell, vintage corals and one-of-a-kind turquoise gemstones. You can take the stone pendants out and wear the hoops solo or in different variations. It is said that turquoise balances and aligns all the chakras, stabilising mood swings and instilling inner calm. Every piece is unique. They are made by hand in Germany. They come in a beautiful Smilla Brav jewellery box. Due to the unique nature of the stones, every piece is different and the sizes may vary. After each use gently wipe jewellery with a soft cloth and store it in the original Smilla Brav jewellery box or dust bag. Always protect it from sharp blows, scratching, chemicals, sunlight and heat/cold. Keep silver in a dark, cool and dry place. Saltwater, detergents, harsh chemicals such as chlorine bleach, hairspray, perfume and perspiration can cause damage and discolouration. Please note that every gem is one of a kind and can be slightly different in appearance from the image.

products.name: Women's Off-the-Shoulder Halter Midi-Dress - Emerald - Size 2
products.brandedName: Oscar de la Renta Women's Off-the-Shoulder Halter Midi-Dress - Emerald - Size 2
products.unbrandedName: Women's Off-the-Shoulder Halter Midi-Dress - Emerald - Size 2
products.description: This season, Oscar de la Renta's co-creative directors, Laura Kim and Fernando Garcia, were inspired by the exhilarating transformation of Winter into Spring. Romantic hollyhocks, camellia, and gardenia motifs underscore the brand's signature polished elegance. Crafted of Italian stretch cotton, this charming off-the-shoulder midi-dress adds a halter self-tie strap to its fitted bodice and knife-pleated skirt. Asymmetric neck, halter self-tie Off-the-shoulder sleeves Side on-seam pockets Hidden back-zip closure 98% cotton/2% elastane Dry clean Made in Italy SIZE & FIT Model measurements: 5'10" tall Model is wearing a US size 4 ABOUT THE BRAND After working for some of fashion's greatest designers, Oscar de la Renta started his own line in 1965. He was an instant hit, thanks to his penchant for romantic silhouettes in vibrant colors and prints. His iconic legacy lives on through Creative Directors Fernando Garcia and Laura Kim's stunning vision for the brand's ready-to-wear and accessories. Designer Evening - Oscar De La Renta > Oscar De La Renta > Saks Fifth Avenue > Barneys. Oscar de la Renta. Color: Emerald. Size: 2.

products.name: Johanna Ortiz Tropical Enclave Beach Bag in Burgundy
products.brandedName: Johanna Ortiz Tropical Enclave Beach Bag in Burgundy
products.unbrandedName: Tropical Enclave Beach Bag in Burgundy
products.description: Johanna Ortiz Tropical Enclave Beach Bag in Burgundy Raffia exterior and lining. Made in Colombia. Open top with dual leather tassel tie closure. Interior hanging leather pocket. Dual woven leather top handles. Detachable leather shoulder strap. Measures approx 12.5W x 16H x 12.5D Top handles with a 5 drop Shoulder strap with a 15.5 drop. JOTZ-WY14. AC01168. About the designer: After graduating from Fashion Design at the Art Institute of Fort Lauderdale, Johanna Ortiz moved back to her native Colombia to start her own couture label. With an innate love for her country, she strongly prioritizes collaborating with indigenous communities, women with culturally-born talents and the finest craftsman in Colombia to ensure each garment is constructed using exclusive materials and innovative techniques. Elegant and feminine, Johanna Ortiz celebrates women and encourages them to have fun with ready-to-wear while exploring their own style.
